title: Why do you find Awkwafina attractive or why not? - Quora

response.answer_text: I haven’t found any picture of her where you can actually see her. It’s all makeup and gloss. She seems to have a nice, broad and honest smile, that goes a long way towards attractiveness for me. I wouldn’t call her unattractive, but I wouldn’d say attractive either. I generally tune down my attractiveness score by the amount of makeup used / It looks great on many people, but I can only rate the work of Art then, not the person wearing it :)
To me she seems average, not hot not ugly:
